import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import calender from "../img/icon/calendar.png" import blog1 from "../img/blog/blog-1.jpg" import blog2 from "../img/blog/blog-2.jpg" import blog3 from "../img/blog/blog-3.jpg" const Blog = () => { const location = useLocation(); const isKhmer = location.pathname.startsWith('/kh'); const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { document.querySelectorAll('.set-bg').forEach((element) => { const bg = element.getAttribute('data-setbg'); element.style.backgroundImage = `url(${bg})`; }); }, []); return (
{/* */}

) } export default Blog
